entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023
